text: Oni sprashivayut tebya o novoluniyakh. Skazhi [, o Mukhammad]: "[Novoluniya] opredelyayut vremya dlya lyudey i dlya soversheniya khaddzha". Blagochestiye ne v tom, chtoby vkhodit' v doma s ikh zadney storony, blagochestiv tot, kto bogoboyaznen. Vkhodite zhe v doma cherez dveri, boytes' Allakha, - byt' mozhet, vy preuspeyete
